name: Air Combat
overview: Air Combat is a two player vs only shooter game in which one player controls a black airplane, and the other player controls a blue airplane. The goal of the game is to take out your opponent until he /she is completely out of lives. This game was developed by Antti Kylonen and Juha Ervasi and published by Protcol Productions Oy in the Finnish based disk magazine Floppy Magazine 64. Issue: 1998/1.
